acts.act: Protection of children from sexual offence act 2012

business_details.Business: Fixing for Production.

Accused Rajen Garh is produced from Jail Hazat and he is remanded till next date.         The accused person has express his inability  to engaged defense counsel. Hence Sri Jitu Paul Advocate of Diphu Bar Association is hereby appointed as Legal Aid Counsel from the panel prepared by the D.L.S.A, Karbi Anglong, Diphu. Furnish copy to the concern accordingly.        Heard the submissions duly advanced by the learned lawyers of both sides as well as case record, I find that there is a ground for presuming that the accused  committed offence punishable under section 363 IPC of 4 of the POCSO Act.  and acccordingly charge is framed. The particulars of the offences charged is duly read over and explained to the accused person to which he pleaded not guilty and claimed to be tried.          Issue summons to PWs.
accused is produced from Jail Hazat and further remanded till next date.PWs absent. summons issued not returned. issue fresh.
